title: Tell me about a time when you were sick. What did you do?

korean: 얼마 전에 감기 걸려서 며칠 동안 고생했어.
처음엔 목이 좀 아프더니 점점 심해지더라고.
열도 나고 기침도 심해져서 일도 제대로 못했어.
약국 가서 감기약 사 먹었는데 잘 낫지 않았어.
결국 병원 가서 진료 받고 처방전 받았어.
의사 선생님이 충분히 쉬라고 하셔서 회사에 연차 냈어.
집에서 푹 쉬면서 따뜻한 물 많이 마셨어.
죽이랑 국 같은 소화 잘 되는 음식 위주로 먹었어.
비타민C도 챙겨 먹고 일찍 자려고 노력했어.
그 이후로는 평소에 건강 관리를 더 신경 쓰게 됐어.
english: A while ago, I caught a cold and suffered for a few days.
At first, my throat hurt a little, and then it, like, gradually got worse.
I had a fever and severe coughing, so I couldn't work properly.
I went to the pharmacy and bought cold medicine, but it didn't get better.
Eventually I went to the hospital, got examined, and received a prescription.
The doctor told me to rest enough, so I took a day off from work.
I rested well at home and drank lots of warm water.
I mainly ate easily digestible foods like porridge and soup.
I also took vitamin C and tried to sleep early.
After resting well for about 3 days, I got, you know, much better.
I felt the preciousness of health once again.
Since then, I've been paying more attention to health management.
